snippet.textDisplay:
I guess it is going to be race between which talk show host is going to sign up Amber Heard to hear her explain these audio leaks
of her admitting her violence towards Johnny Depp. Also, hearing how she was going to play the justice system, jury, and woke media
to paint Depp as the villain, whilst all the playing the meek, innocent victim.
She has done a wonderful service for the Men's Rights Movement, this is a high profile case that was played out in the media and not
some unfortunate Joe Blogg that no one has ever heard of.

Amber Heard has provided proof to what many men have been saying for years, that the justice system and social attitudes, immediately
judge the man to be guilty, just on the word of a woman.


I hope that Depp instructs his lawyers should show no mercy and go for the JUGULAR!
Not only should he look to get the money back from the divorce settlement, but also seek compensation for monies lost due to cancelled
contracts.There are no doubt that out there, there will be some people who should say that Johnny Depp should not pursue her through the courts, as the
audio leaks would of already ruined her reputation, I say 'NO FUCKING WAY!'
He shouldn't let this slide. This would still lead to Femnazi and those woke journalist to look the other way and pretend that this
didn't happen or that it was 50/50!!!

Depp' voice was silenced by the media and by Hollywood and he must have been going through some kind of mental hell, when Heard dragged
his name and reputation through the legal system, through the court of public perception.
Knowing that he was the victim in this affair, seeing how the media courted Amber Heard, presenting her as some kind of heroine and as a figurehead
to the female victims of domestic violence.
She has made a mockery of the judiciary, a mug out of the jury and a mug out of the general public, not that it was too hard, for this
has been the way for men, for many years!

It is now time for Amber Heard to learn that payback is a BITCH!

snippet.textDisplay: The problem with this whole case is that the proof that he is innocent has been there all along. Here in this news report by ABC news from 2016 (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t1yAkFZnQOk) it says she showed up at court friday to request a TRO with photos of her bruise (also with the bruise on her face), and then they show a photo of her 'stepping out' on saturday and there is NO mark on her face. Winona, Vanessa, and Depps first wife (just between Winona and Vanessa that's 19 years of relationship btw) came forward and said they never experienced anything like that with him. Now given that he left Vanessa for Amber this would have been the time if he had abused her to speak up, but instead Vanessa defended him, and no one cared. It was also made public at that time that Amber was arrested for DV in an airport several years before, and again no one cared. Then her TRO was dismissed with prejudice. 'With prejudice' means the case was reviewed by a judge and the case was dismissed on the basis of merits and can't be submitted ever again. 'Merits' means the facts presented in evidence. The evidence has always been there. She says he gave her a busted lip, 2 black eyes, and beat her within an inch of her life. This is the day after (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FVPmTXRQY54). Funny... her face looks fine to me. However, this is acceptable because it aligns with the current social narrative. Why does society want to vilify men? Don’t get me wrong, there are some terrible men out there, but there are also terrible women out there. Why is it that people have such a hard time believing that men can be victims? I am a woman and I am a DV survivor. My mother is also a survivor. My closest male friend is a DV survivor, and the worst it ever was his girlfriend (now ex obviously) tried to hit him in the head with a hammer claw side down. My second closest male friend survived a relationship that was both mentally and emotionally abusive, and thankfully got out before it became physical as well. In fact, I have more male friends than female friends who have experienced some type of abuse in a relationship. Why does the world want to mock and shame male victims into silence? If a man stands there and let’s a woman hit him and doesn’t fight back he’s weak and pathetic, but if he defends himself he’s an abuser. You can’t have it both ways. If you are out there fighting for equal rights then that means actually equal, not holding men to a different standard than woman. If it's never okay for a man to hit a woman, then it's never okay for a woman to hit a man. Facts.

snippet.textDisplay:
She never accuses him of being abusive to her. If she was a “victim” of abuse she would be throwing that abuse in his face but all she does is degrade him and call him a coward for running away every time they fight. She never asks him to stop fighting like Johnny does, all she complained about is Johnny not being there for her and running away. She gaslights him, makes fun of him and yells at him. She is disgusting for crying wolf and pretending to be an abuse victim when she was the abuser.
Unless people are choosing to ignore the full audio, there is do doubt she is the abuser....everything she said is something an abuser says. If she was a man and said the same things people would lose their minds. I hope Johnny wins his lawsuit against her.

snippet.textDisplay: im a huge fan of johnny depp and was so sad about the entire abuse thing. There wasn't really any evidence that I could find of his abuse being true but people are so fast to conclusions and the internet and a lot of my old friends (mainly my facebook social justice warrior friends) were saying horrible things about him and the people who support him. I didn't want to support a predator and did want to believe her, but it just seemed so unfair on his side. I'm so glad its starting to clear up for him. We still don't know the whole story, but please don't jump to conclusions until the facts are out☹️

snippet.textDisplay:
I just signed the petition. I, for one, can admit that I fell into the trap of believing some of the allegations but her conversation does not sound like someone who was abused.

I was expecting to hear “can you promise to stop abusing me as well?” from someone who is being abused or “why do you not account for when you hit me”? Instead she taunts that her so called abuser decides to leave instead of engage further in physical altercation.

No one can confirm what really happened during the entirety of their relationship but her reaction to the video and the double standard her lawyer is using is truly unprofessional and appalling

snippet.textDisplay:
Heard's lawyer should have just kept quiet. Instead she dug herself, and Heard, into an even bigger hole. The audio explicitly shows that Depp wants to avoid physical violence at every turn. When they get shouty, Depp wants to GET AWAY from the fight, not escalate it even further. It's Depp who makes the suggestion that he and Heard seperate if there's any hint of the fight becoming physical and HEARD is the one saying that NOT ONLY DOES SHE NOT WANT TO SEPERATE but ALSO THAT SHE CANNOT GUARANTEE SHE WON'T GET PHYSICAL AGAIN.

It is OBVIOUS even at this stage who the ACTUAL perpetrator really is, and it's become ESPECIALLY apparent with the additional leaked audio where Heard says if Depp would tell other people he's the victim of domestic violence then nobody would believe him. Because, according to Heard, he's a big man and she's a small woman. It's despicable.
snippet.textOriginal:
Heard's lawyer should have just kept quiet. Instead she dug herself, and Heard, into an even bigger hole. The audio explicitly shows that Depp wants to avoid physical violence at every turn. When they get shouty, Depp wants to GET AWAY from the fight, not escalate it even further. It's Depp who makes the suggestion that he and Heard seperate if there's any hint of the fight becoming physical and HEARD is the one saying that NOT ONLY DOES SHE NOT WANT TO SEPERATE but ALSO THAT SHE CANNOT GUARANTEE SHE WON'T GET PHYSICAL AGAIN. 

It is OBVIOUS even at this stage who the ACTUAL perpetrator really is, and it's become ESPECIALLY apparent with the additional leaked audio where Heard says if Depp would tell other people he's the victim of domestic violence then nobody would believe him. Because, according to Heard, he's a big man and she's a small woman. It's despicable.

Dear Amber Heard,

You are part of the reason why ACTUAL struggling women and abuse victims are still fighting for equal rights, justice, and etc. Please do all of us a favor and either get yourself some SERIOUS HELP or stop talking altogether if this is merely another famous person's ruse to be representational and sensational in the public eye.
